get.summary: DelegatorDelegations queries all delegations of a given delegator address.

parameters.name: delegator_addr
parameters.description: delegator_addr defines the delegator address to query for.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

get.summary: Redelegations queries redelegations of given address.

parameters.name: delegator_addr
parameters.description: delegator_addr defines the delegator address to query for.

parameters.name: src_validator_addr
parameters.description: src_validator_addr defines the validator address to redelegate from.

parameters.name: dst_validator_addr
parameters.description: dst_validator_addr defines the validator address to redelegate to.

parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:

It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit

If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.count_total
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs. count_total
is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key is set.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.title:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageResponse.title:
PageResponse is to be embedded in gRPC response messages where the corresponding
request message has used PageRequest

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description:
Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount.

NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method
signatures required by gogoproto.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Commission.description: Commission defines a commission parameters for a given validator.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.CommissionRates.description:
CommissionRates defines the initial commission rates to be used for creating
a validator.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Delegation.description:
Delegation represents the bond with tokens held by an account. It is
owned by one delegator, and is associated with the voting power of one
validator.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.DelegationRespons.description:
DelegationResponse is equivalent to Delegation except that it contains a balance
in addition to shares which is more suitable for client responses.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.HistoricalInfo.description:
HistoricalInfo contains the historical information that gets stored at
each height.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the staking module.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Pool.title: Pool - tracking bonded and not-bonded token supply of the bond denomination

delegation_response.description: delegation_responses defines the delegation info of a delegation.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryDelegationRe.description: QueryDelegationResponse is response type for the Query/Delegation RPC method.

delegation_responses.description: delegation_responses defines all the delegations' info of a delegator.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryDelegatorDel.description: QueryDelegatorDelegationsResponse is response type for the Query/DelegatorDelegations RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryDelegatorUnb.description: QueryUnbondingDelegatorDelegationsResponse is response type for the Query/UnbondingDelegatorDelegations RPC method.

validator.description: validator defines the the validator info.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryDelegatorVal.description: QueryDelegatorValidatorResponse response type for the Query/DelegatorValidator RPC method.

validators.description: validators defines the the validators' info of a delegator.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryDelegatorVal.description: QueryDelegatorValidatorsResponse is response type for the Query/DelegatorValidators RPC method.

hist.description: hist defines the historical info at the given height.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryHistoricalIn.description: QueryHistoricalInfoResponse is response type for the Query/HistoricalInfo RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryParamsRespon.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryPoolResponse.description: QueryPoolResponse is response type for the Query/Pool RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryRedelegation.description: QueryRedelegationsResponse is response type for the Query/Redelegations RPC method.

unbond.description: unbond defines the unbonding information of a delegation.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryUnbondingDel.description: QueryDelegationResponse is response type for the Query/UnbondingDelegation RPC method.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryValidatorDel.title: QueryValidatorDelegationsResponse is response type for the Query/ValidatorDelegations RPC method

validator.description: validator defines the the validator info.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryValidatorRes.title: QueryValidatorResponse is response type for the Query/Validator RPC method

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryValidatorUnb.description: QueryValidatorUnbondingDelegationsResponse is response type for the Query/ValidatorUnbondingDelegations RPC method.

validators.description: validators contains all the queried validators.

pagination.description: pagination defines the pagination in the response.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.QueryValidatorsRe.title: QueryValidatorsResponse is response type for the Query/Validators RPC method

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Redelegation.description:
Redelegation contains the list of a particular delegator's redelegating bonds
from a particular source validator to a particular destination validator.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.RedelegationEntry.description: RedelegationEntry defines a redelegation object with relevant metadata.

RedelegationEntryResponse is equivalent to a RedelegationEntry except that it
contains a balance in addition to shares which is more suitable for client
responses.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.RedelegationRespo.description:
RedelegationResponse is equivalent to a Redelegation except that its entries
contain a balance in addition to shares which is more suitable for client
responses.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.title:
UnbondingDelegation stores all of a single delegator's unbonding bonds
for a single validator in an time-ordered list

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.UnbondingDelegati.description: UnbondingDelegationEntry defines an unbonding object with relevant metadata.

cosmos.staking.v1beta1.Validator.description:
Validator defines the total amount of bond shares and their exchange rate to
coins. Slashing results in a decrease in the exchange rate, allowing correct
calculation of future undelegations without iterating over delegators.
When coins are delegated to this validator, the validator is credited with a
delegation whose number of bond shares is based on the amount of coins
delegated divided by the current exchange rate. Voting power can be
calculated as total bonded shares multiplied by exchange rate.

validators_hash.title: hashes from the app output from the prev block

tendermint.types.Header.description: Header defines the structure of a Tendermint block header.

tendermint.version.Consensus.description:
Consensus captures the consensus rules for processing a block in the blockchain,
including all blockchain data structures and the rules of the application's
state transition machine.
